dublin_core.dcvalue: MomConnect aims to improve both the demand for MCH services, through providing pregnant women with information via messages, and the supply side through impacting on quality via user feedback.
Facility-based patient, Community member, Facility-based provider, Facility-based patient, Facility, Public sector health system (national, regional, district)
Dr. Yogan Pillay Deputy Director- General HIV/AIDS, TB & MCHW pillay@health.gov.za
USAID, Johnson & Johnson, Elma Philanthropies, Discovery Foundation

Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider training and education, Child health, HIV/AIDS, Maternal health, Newborn heath
